q: why do the goalkeepers in white clothes fall down
pred: The goalkeepers in white clothes are wearing helmets and knee pads, which are designed to protect them from injuries during the game. They are also wearing white clothes, which are designed to make them more visible to the players on the field. This is important because goalkeepers need to be able to quickly react to the ball and make saves, and wearing white clothes helps them stand out from the rest of the players.
